basics.name: Sol Ferguson
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary:
Full-stack web developer with IT, systems administration, mobile hardware, and management experience. Looking for the next challenge and opportunity to grow my passion for web development by evolving my current skills as well as learning new languages and frameworks.
 10+ years of experience in IT with extensive knowledge of large scale integrations/deployments, API integration, Scripting and SSO.
 Driven self-learner with a passion for technology and sciences, generally imperturbable, open, and honest to a fault. I became a developer to make ideas into realities, and excel at doing it. The daily challenges, constant learning, and problem solving of tech is what I live for. My code is clean, efficient, and I always keep in mind the current and future implications of my code.

highlights: Meet IT needs during hyper-growth phase consisting of tripling headcount from 48 to 184 and multiple expansions/consolidations of office space into new locations.
Own designated software or hardware systems, and take responsibility for their maintenance and operation
Provide expertise and advise all IT infrastructure decisions, including Ticketing, Inventory Management, Networking, Access Control, CCTV Security, IAM, SaaS & Security
Provide hands-on support for employees across all IT systems and services, resolving problems in a timely manner according to SLA of 24-48 hours average.
Educate and assist with meetings, training materials, and goal-setting involving information technology (IT).
Manage internal data processing, system data extraction and import requests (Rsync, GSuite, SCP, AWS and S3, & other CLI/Linux tools as required)
Regular liaison with our IT suppliers and stakeholders
Produce high quality documentation relating to IT services
Delivery of regular IT services reporting
End to end ownership and implementation of security software and tools
Contribute to ongoing development of internal processes and documentation
Owned deployment of Oomnitza Asset management software and integration with JAMF, Jira Service Desk, developed & documented new processes
Owned deployment of company-wide dashboard/digital signage solution
Setup, maintain, and deploy AV solutions for 18+ Google Meets meeting rooms, in addition to all hands space Zoom/Crestron system
Upgraded UniFi network infrastructure to improve network stability and performance as Toronto office doubled headcount
Assisted with office move logistics and planning
Resolve tickets consistently within 2 day SLA & ensure excellence of all other KPIs

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
